countryIsoCode.help: Select the country where you have a citizenship or registered business.
countryIsoCode.label: Country

selfieImgUrl.help: Your face and passport details must be clearly visible
selfieImgUrl.label: Selfie with the ID/passport

headers.infoAccepted: Thanks, we have received your information

texts.checking: We need some time to verify the information that you've sent.
texts.checking2: We are checking the provided information. Once it's done and approved, you'll be able to add new events
texts.fixIssues: We have checked your Business Details and couldn't approve it because of the following reason: "{{reason}}". Please fix those issues.
texts.fixIssues2: The business account didn't pass the verification because of the following reason: "{{reason}}".
texts.negativeBalance: You have negative account balance. You need to transfer money to Leela.Game to fix that before adding new events. Please contact us by email support@leela.game to get bank account credentials.
texts.weNeedToKnowYou: Before you start adding events, we need to get your Business Details.

headers.infoAccepted: Thanks, we have received your information

texts.checking: We need some time to verify the information that you've sent.
texts.checking2: We are checking the provided information. Once it's done and approved, you'll be able to add new events
texts.fixIssues: We have checked your Business Details and couldn't approve it because of the following reason: "{{reason}}". Please fix those issues.
texts.weNeedToKnowYou: Before you start adding events, we need to get your Business Details.

texts.howToEnableSalesInRussia: If you want to be able to sell tickets to Russian customers, you need to create an account in RUB (Russian Ruble) currency on Leela.Game platform. You must have a Russian citizenship or have a registered business in Russia, and an account in Russian bank.
texts.howToEnableSalesInWorld: The main currency on Leela.Game platform is EUR (Euro). If you want to accept payments from customers around the world, you need to create an EUR account on Leela.Game platform. You must have a citizenship or registered business, and a bank account in any country except North Korea and Russia.
